backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining types (Language, Message, VideoRequest, ColdEmailRequest, UserProfile, VoiceoverRequest, SubtitleRequest, SeoPackRequest, ImageGenerationParams, CoinPurchasePlan, TransactionRecord) and implementing core backend logic for AI content generation, user management, coin transactions, and authorization using AccessControl and MixinAuthorization modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features for AI Image Generator including single-input interface, auto-enhanced prompts, 10-coin generation cost, loading states, image display with download, and insufficient balance messaging, with high confidence and mapped test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including screens (Dashboard, Chat, Profile, YouTube Script, AI Video Maker, Cold Email, AI Image Generator), hooks (useHashRoute, useChat, useProfile, useYouTubeScript, useAIVideoMaker, useAIImageGenerator), utilities, and shared constants for languages and coins.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode CSS variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, input, ring, chart colors, and sidebar theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, title 'Wrapper AI - Define Your Project', description meta tag, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component creating a memoized QueryClient with 5-minute stale time, wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, rendering AppContent, and including Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AppContent.tsx: Authentication gate component with comprehensive error handling, console logging for debugging, loading state during initialization, error fallback UI with retry, and conditional rendering of LoginScreen or AuthenticatedLayout based on identity status.
frontend/src/components/AuthenticatedLay: Main authenticated layout with sticky header showing logo and coin balance, desktop/mobile navigation to seven screens (Dashboard, Chat, YouTube Script, AI Video Maker, Cold Email, AI Image Generator, Profile), low balance warning, logout functionality, mobile hamburger menu, footer with attribution, and integrated CoinPurchaseDialog.
frontend/src/components/CoinGate.tsx: Reusable coin gating component that checks user balance against ACTION_COST and conditionally displays an insufficient coins alert with 'Buy Coins' button or renders children based on showInsufficientMessage prop.
frontend/src/components/CoinPurchaseDial: Dialog component for purchasing coin packs, displaying available plans as selectable cards and handling purchase transactions with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Card component that displays a scrollable list of recent coin transactions with credit/debit indicators, timestamps, and balance information.
frontend/src/constants/coins.ts: Defines coin-related constants including action costs (20), image generation cost (10), low balance threshold (40), and user-facing messages.
frontend/src/constants/languages.ts: Exports an array of 50+ language options with value/label pairs for script, voice, and subtitle language selectors.
frontend/src/hooks/coinQueryKeys.ts: Centralized React Query key definitions for coin-related queries: balance, plans, and transactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIImageGenerator.t: Hook for AI image generation that checks coin balance, charges IMAGE_GENERATION_COST, calls external AI API (placeholder config), and manages generated image state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIVideoMaker.ts: Hook for AI video generation providing generateScript and generateStoryboard functions that build VideoRequest objects from form data and call backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Manages chat state and message sending with image attachment support, validates inputs, handles coin errors, and invalidates coin-related queries after successful messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoinBalance.ts: Fetches and returns the user's coin balance from the backend actor using React Query.
Fetches available coin purchase plans from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useColdEmailGenerator: Generates cold emails via backend actor, handles coin errors, and invalidates coin queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useHashRoute.ts: Manages hash-based routing for different views (dashboard, chat, profile, youtube-script, ai-video-maker, cold-email, ai-image-generator) with navigation helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality, identity management, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save user profile data via backend actor with React Query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/usePurchaseCoins.ts: Handles coin purchase mutations via backend actor and invalidates coin balance and transaction queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeoPackGenerator.t: Generates SEO packs (title, description, tags) for videos via backend actor with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubtitlesGenerator: Generates subtitles in normal and SRT formats from video scripts via backend actor, with fallback SRT generation from text.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactionHistory: Fetches user transaction history from backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceoverGenerator: Generates voiceover text with customizable voice parameters (gender, language, speed, emotion) via backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeScript.ts: Generates YouTube video scripts with detailed specifications (topic, language, tone, length) via backend actor, handles coin errors, and invalidates coin queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts (Inter and Space Grotesk), Tailwind directives, and defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme colors using HSL values with a warm coral/orange primary palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/buildP: Utility function that generates a formatted text timeline plan from video maker form data and photo order, including settings, sequence, and time breakdown.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/musicL: Defines MusicTrack interface and generates a mock music library of 1500 tracks across 12 categories (Trending, Cinematic, Emotional, etc.) for the AI video maker.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/MusicL: Music library browser component with search, category filtering, and track selection functionality for choosing background music from a generated library.
frontend/src/pages/ai-video-maker/PhotoT: Photo timeline builder allowing users to upload images, reorder them with up/down controls, and remove photos to create a video sequence.
frontend/src/pages/AIChatScreen.tsx: Chat interface component that allows users to send text messages and image attachments to an AI assistant, handles file uploads with preview, displays conversation history, and manages coin balance with purchase dialog for insufficient funds.
frontend/src/pages/AIImageGeneratorScree: AI image generation interface that accepts text prompts, displays coin balance, validates sufficient coins before generation, shows generated images with download capability, and includes coin purchase dialog.
frontend/src/pages/AIVideoMakerScreen.ts: Comprehensive video creation tool with multiple modes (2D Explainer, Short Video, Photo Slideshow) that generates scripts, storyboards, and animation plans, includes music library integration, photo timeline builder, and exports video configuration as downloadable files.
frontend/src/pages/ColdEmailScreen.tsx: Cold email generator interface with form fields for sender/target information, customizable email parameters (goal, tone, length), optional follow-ups and spam analysis, and displays generated email output with copy functionality and coin purchase integration.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardScreen.tsx: Main dashboard displaying authentication status with Internet Identity principal ID, coin balance with low balance alerts, transaction history panel, and navigation cards to various AI features (chat, image generation, video maker, cold email).
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen component that handles Internet Identity authentication with popup blocker detection, error handling, and automatic redirect to dashboard upon successful login.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileScreen.tsx: User profile management screen allowing users to view/edit display name and avatar, copy their principal ID, and logout with profile data persisted to the blockchain.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectDefinitionScre: Project definition wizard form that collects project requirements including goal, target users, key features, and constraints with validation and summary display.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Script: React component for YouTube script generation with form inputs for topic, languages, length, tone, and other settings; displays generated scripts and handles insufficient coins with purchase dialog.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/SeoPac: React component that generates comprehensive YouTube SEO content (titles, description, tags, hashtags, pinned comment, chapters) based on video title and main topic inputs.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Subtit: React component for generating subtitles from script, voiceover, or pasted text with configurable language and style; outputs both normal and SRT format with download capability.
frontend/src/pages/youtube-script/Voiceo: React component for generating voiceover text from scripts with configurable voice gender, language, speed, and emotion settings; can reuse script from Script Tab or accept pasted input.
frontend/src/pages/YouTubeScriptScreen.t: Tabbed interface for YouTube content creation with four sections: script generation, voiceover, subtitles, and SEO pack, passing generated content between tabs.
frontend/src/utils/aiVideoMakerSummary.t: Builds a formatted text summary of AI video maker configuration including mode, format, effects, voiceover, music settings, and other parameters.
frontend/src/utils/coinErrors.ts: Utility functions to detect insufficient coins errors and return appropriate error messages for coin-related failures.
frontend/src/utils/downloadImageFile.ts: Helper function to programmatically download an image file by creating and clicking a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/utils/downloadTextFile.ts: Helper function to download text content as a file by creating a Blob and triggering a download via a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Utility functions for handling image attachments including File-to-Uint8Array conversion, Blob URL creation/revocation, and image validation (type, size, dimensions).
frontend/src/utils/parseYouTubeScript.ts: Parses raw YouTube script text into structured sections (Hook, Introduction, Main Points, etc.) by detecting markdown headings and organizing content in a predefined order.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, font families (Inter, Space Grotesk), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an AI Image Generator app with coin-based generation system (50 free coins, 10 per image), Internet Identity authentication, React/TypeScript frontend, Motoko backend, and external API integration for image generation.
